name: Thinkflow
overview:
Thinkflow is a Business process optimization company

Thinkflow Software is an enterprise software company and our products and solutions help our clients leverage heavily on existing Microsoft investments. Our Business Process Management (BPM) and Document Management System (DMS) products are helping our customers become more efficient and manage content effectively across the organization.

Products:

  • Thinkflow BPM helps companies become more efficient and agile by helping them automate key business processes.

  • Thinkflow DMS is a document management system built on top of Microsoft SharePoint 2013/2010 and helps organizations manage enterprise content and documents effectively across the organization.

Solutions:

  • Accounts Payable System
  • Vendor Management System
  • Quality Management System
  • Case Management System

Consulting

  • BPM Consulting
  • SharePoint Consulting (2010/2013)

Thinkflow is a Microsoft ISV and Solutions Partner and all our products work seamlessly with Microsoft Technologies like SharePoint, Office, InfoPath etc.

Our customers rely on our products and solution to automate processes, identify and mitigate process and document risks, manage compliance, build production ready systems faster and improve effectiveness across the organization.

Our customer engage with our consultants for developing and deploying production ready application & enterprise solutions with BPM and SharePoint
